message: Greetings! I'm offering a unique product for $10000. It's a one-time opportunity with no discounts.  I understand there's a 33.33% chance it's high-quality.  Would you like to take a chance on this investment?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, with no sales history to gauge the quality of your products, I'm not willing to take the risk at this time. I'll wait and see how others fare before making a decision.

Since I have no information to base my decision on, and the odds are heavily stacked against me (66.67% chance of a worthless product), I'm going to pass on this one. I'll keep an eye on your future sales and revisit if the odds look more favorable.
